DataElement.preferredName: Product Relationship Active Ingredient Flag ISO21090.BL.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Specifies whether the ingredient is an active ingredient.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something._Exerting influence or producing an effect; taking part in an activity.:That which enters into a compound, or is a component part of any combination or mixture; an element; a constituent.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something.

Concepts.definition: The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.
A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something.

Property.preferredDefinition: Exerting influence or producing an effect; taking part in an activity.:That which enters into a compound, or is a component part of any combination or mixture; an element; a constituent.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

Concepts.definition: Exerting influence or producing an effect.
That which enters into a compound, or is a component part of any combination or mixture; an element; a constituent.
An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader
Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
